Articles.Content:
I'm having a strange problem with the stock radial mount parachutes... If I place more than one, then one will rapidly heat and explode, generally only the one on the right side of the spacecraft. All the mods I have installed are for 1.0 so  *shouldn't*  be a problem. Anybody else experiencing this kind of weirdness?

My interplanetary ships rely heavily on radial mount 'chutes so it's kind of a concern...
Are you mounting these using symmetry or manually placing all of the parachutes manually? Also, where abouts are these chutes mounted in relation to the nose of the craft?
